content: First, small thing, but something that needs to be fixed. When I asked what the field should be, you made me replace the text instead of just generating the full service account email correctly. You need to be looking constantly for ways to squeeze out waste while not sacrificing quality. There is not role called Firestore Admin. Basic role listed are Browser, Editor, Owner, View, then there are a ton of role "By product or service", but that isn't one of them.
